short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bot assistant pour la revue de code avec ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An advanced extension powered by large language models like ChatGPT, designed to elevate your Github experience. With this tool, developers can streamline their asynchronous code review process. Users can swiftly request comment reformulations, seek suggestions, and ask for improvements, ensuring comments are relevant and constructive. Reduce toxic or irrelevant feedback within a swift 10-second window. Our mission? To boost code quality, foster effective communication, diminish errors, and uplift developer productivity. Witness a transformative reduction in unproductive comments, aiming for a 50% cut in toxic feedback and a 15% decrease in irrelevant remarks. Let's make coding on Github a more collaborative endeavor!
